full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSKYED RIM GYI KHRID THUN MONG MA YIN PA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG KUN GYI GZHUNG LAM BSKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @045B (CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RIM PA DANG PO'I ZAB KHRID THUN MONGS MA YIN PA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG GRUB PA'I BANG PHYUG KUN GYI GZHUNG LAm BSKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES PA 'DI NI, RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR KUN GYI BDAG PO KUN MKHYEN BLA MA RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS BZHI SOGS 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MAS ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BLANGS PA, KHYAD PAR DU RIGS DANG DKYOR KUN GYI BDAG PO @046A *, ,RIM GNYIS MTHAR PHYIN PA'I RNAM 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I 'DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYI ZHABS DRUNG DU CHOS 'DI'I RIM GNYIS KYI NYAMS KHRID NYAN BSHAD DANG, DE'I YAN LAG DRUG PA BCU CHE CHUNG SBYIN BSREGS SOGS LAG KHRID DU THOB PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG MANG THOS SPONG BA PA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES RANG GI BLO LA JI LTAR NGES PA'I GSUNG RNAMS ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG, `RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DU RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RIN GDU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, CHOS 'DI LA GZHAN GYIS 'CHOS PA DANG, 'BRID PA DANG, PHRAG DOG GIS SMOD PA BYUNG NA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RNAM GSUM GYIS BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN DE'I SNYING PHYUNG ZHIG ,MA DAD PA DANG DAM MED LA STON PA LA STON MKHAN DANG BLTA MKHAN DE 'DRA TSAR CHOD CIG ,)
